data.text: @RichardTheAZN denied today. Here you find more details about travelling with pets https://t.co/pJLC9xiIpn . Kind regards

@RichardTheAZN Hola Richard, we're deeply sorry to read this. In case you wish to submit a complaint, please use the online form, as instructed in our DMs. Unfortunately, only cats, dogs, birds, fish and turtles are allowed to fly in the cabin, that's why the rabbit's boarding was /1

@racheldpak Hola Rachel, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send us a DM with your postal address, so we can confirm that our colleagues sent the check to the correct address? https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@RichardTheAZN Hola Richard, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send us a DM with the passenger's full name, booking code, ticket number and more details about what happened?

urls.title: Complaints about service - Iberia
urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text: @claire_rielly Hola Claire, sorry for the inconvenience. On the following link you find our claims form https://t.co/pVVvyfKnbj . If you also need assistance with a flight relocation, please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@volcanopele Hola Jason, We are sorry for the delay in receiving assistance at the airport. We understand that our colleagues should be able to assist you as soon as possible. If you end up having a setback we would like you to tell us to review alternatives, regards.

data.text: @Moken2012 Hola, sorry to read this. Please delete the booking code from your public tweet and send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...) https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@markdore Hola Mark, we're sorry to read this. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name, ticket number and more details about your query. Notice that if you missed a connection flight, the relocation should be requested at the airport. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@ryan_c814 Hola Ryan, sorry for the delay. Since you already contacted AA, we kindly ask you to please wait for an update. We appreciate your patience. Kind regards
@OMaehler Hola Olivia, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us all details of your situation by DM to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@DanGreaves08 thank you Dan, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@ErimelT Hola, indícanos por DM detalles de tu consulta sobre el vuelo dentro de 11 días. Gracias
@SammutMichael Hola Michael, we are sorry to read this, could you please give us all details by DM including if you opened a formal complaint at the airport? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@DanGreaves08 Hola Dan, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@ErimelT Hola, sentimos mucho los inconvenientes ocasionados.
@ehretana Hola Paisano, sentimos leer tus comentarios, ¿podrías enviarnos un MD con el número de expediente asociado a tu reclamación para revisar?. Quedamos pendientes. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@elllveee Hola, send us a direct message https://t.co/R34zzY1UII with your full nace and more details about your comment so we can guide you correctly. Kind regards.
@treebae_024 Hola Andrea, we are sorry to read your comments. Please send us a direct message https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI with all the details so we can guide you properly. Kind regards.
@kayjay_potato Khaoula, we are sorry we don´t have any update. We have requested our colleagues; as soon as we have any response we will contact you again.

data.text: @Lulapr2 Hola Lula, por algún motivo no podemos visualizar este mensaje en nuestro sistema por lo que nos gustaria que nos dieras los detalles de la gestion que deseabas llevar a cabo por MD y poder asistirte asi de manera efectiva. Esperamos tu respuesta, saludos. https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@mis61521 Sorry for the inconvenience. We've just replied your DMs
@Malvent Since the boarding was denied by LATAM, they are the only ones that will be able to assist you with the claim. Sorry

@camnyc Hola Chris, award seats on flights operated by partner airlines are limited and subjected to availability. Please contact the Iberia Plus Center by phone in order to verify the availability and complete the purchase: 900 211 214 (from Spain), +34 91 330 73 50 (from outside Spain)
@mis61521 Hola, sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

urls.description: Check the offers of cheap flights from the United States to more than 300 Iberia destinations in Spain, Europe, America and Asia, and reserve it at the best price

data.text: @Malvent The LATAM booking code is available on the booking management page at https://t.co/m6fyDz8Iba and you can always ask us for such code here on Twitter or by contacting our call center.

@Malvent Hola Marcelo, when you book a LATAM flight through Iberia, you need to use your LATAM booking code to complete the check-in with LATAM. Since LATAM operated the flight where your boarding was denied, the claim must be submitted directly to LATAM. Sorry

@Delfisanta Hola Delfi, hemos consultado con nuestros compañeros del departamento correspondiente esta posibilidad. En cuanto tengamos respuesta deberiamos poder hacertelo saber cuanto antes por este canal, agradecemos tu paciencia. Saludos.
@eeeeebcux Hola, unfortunately, not yet. We'll get back to you as soon as we have any news. Sorry for the delay

🥇🥇🥇🥇 Europe's most punctual in September and again in the 🔝 10 in the world. ⏱✈️ 

All the details 👇

data.text: @Lulapr2 Hola Lula, no vemos mensajes recientes por via privada. Si lo deseas puedes darnos los detalles correspondientes de tu consulta para saber de que manera asistirte, quedamos atentos a tu respuesta. Saludos.  https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE

@MrRisso Hola Riss, thank you for contacting us, could you please give us by DM your booking code, ticket number and registered email to verify the information? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@the_wind_spirit Hola, thank you for contacting us, could you give us by DM all details of your situation including flight details , dates to verify the information? Thanks in advance

@JRotsaert Hola Jean, we would like more information about your baggage incident, have you filed a claim through Iberia? If so, please send us a DM with your PIR code and full name to help you from this department. We await the information. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

urls.description: Our Customer Service Centre includes an Iberia Complaints Service for handling customers' complaints and suggestions

data.text:
@EvanZhao6 We understand what you are telling us, Evan. If after the incident you want to initiate a claim, we suggest you proceed through our web form: https://t.co/qlaQPQPy2e
Kind regards.

@EvanZhao6 Hola Evan, we are sorry to read your comments. We understand that after the incident you have received assistance from our colleagues. Please let us know by DM if there is anything we can help you with from this department. Kind regards.
@DebraMoxon Debra, we've responded to your direct messages. Let us know by that means in case of any doubt. Kind regards.

@Lulapr2 Hola, sentimos leer lo que mencionas, para poder revisar más sobre ello, te pedimos contactar en un MD indicando más información sobre el cambio que deseas realizar Saludos  https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@rishicomms Rishi, could you send us a DM with all the details of the canceled flight? (reservation code, ticket number and your full name). We await the information. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@DebraMoxon Hola Debra, we are sorry to read your comments, please send us a DM with all the details of the case if there is anything we can help you with from this department. Kind regards. https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@rishicomms Hola Rishi. We're sorry to read this. We understand that you are communicating with our colleagues over the phone. Is that correct? Could you provide us with more details about this matter?
@charlie_j73 Hola Charlie, please send us a DM with your Iberia booking code and full name https://t.co/R34zzY1UII

@joaomagalhaess Hola João, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your full name, booking code and flight number, so we can check if we have any information about this issue https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@Cruz83333500 Please send us a DM with your full name, phone number with international prefix, the best timeframe for our colleagues to call you and your current location or time zone https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@Cruz83333500 assistance to contact Serviberia, please send us a DM https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

urls.title: Travelling on Iberia for unaccompanied minors - Iberia
urls.description: Unaccompanied minors can use the Iberia companion service. We look after your child and supervise his or her safety on board and at the airport.

data.text: @Cruz83333500 Hola, unfortunately, it's only possible to buy tickets for children younger than 11 over the phone with Serviberia. Also, for this type of booking, the unaccompanied minor service is mandatory. More info at https://t.co/bdJABuQ7b2 . If you need /1
@E_l_y_s_e_ Hola Elyse, sorry for the delay. Please send us a DM with your claim reference number and email address https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@lunafaeart Hola Luna, we're sorry for the inconvenience. How may we assist you? Please send us a DM with more details about your query https://t.co/R34zzY1mTa
@Wictor_Leone You're welcome. We've replied your DMs
@Wictor_Leone Hola, we're sorry for the inconvenience. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

data.text: @MichielDebel Hola Michiel, sorry for the inconvenience. The website is working from our end, please clear all cookies from the browser's memory cache or try again with a different browser or device https://t.co/qlaQPQyv0e
@tanjaweb3 Hola Tanja, please send us a DM with the details. Thank you.
@Ireeeneneko Hola Irene, hemos respondido de manera detallada sobre tu consulta por MD, seguimos atentos a tus comentarios y a tu disposición para cualquier nueva duda o consulta. Un saludo.
@vrmorais Hola. Please send us a DM with your booking code, full name and ticket number (075...). https://t.co/R34zzY1UII
@EdiBonci Thanks, Eduard. Please accept our apologies
@EdiBonci We're sorry for the inconvenience, Eduard. If you need further assistance, please send us a DM with your full name and booking details https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@RickF645 Hola Rick, we're sorry to read this. May we assist you with a specific query? If so, please send us a DM with more details https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@KevinWi73275353 Hola Kevin, we're deeply sorry to read this. Since your ticket was issued by Iberia Express, who also operated the flight you mentioned, please use their online form to submit the complaint https://t.co/gCdaQb7V9c . Then Iberia Express will get back to you by email. Kind regards
@wilshawalex Hola Alex, we replied to your DM. Regards.
@rwatson1955 Hola Roger, ir depends of the regulations and safety measures recommended and settled by the authorities. Regards.

@de49175371 Hola Debbie, we are sorry for the inconvenience, we have replied all details by DM, the area in charge is processing the refund of the pending ticket, we'll contact you back as soon as possible with all details. Regards

@ca10024947 Hola Elena, we have replied your DM with all details, that web link is to verify the status of the complaint, you should write the full case number which we already sent through DM . Kind regards

@MozCris Hola Cris, we are sorry to read this, please ask you rfrined to contact us directly as passenger , she can send us a DM through this link: https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
 . Regards

@eeeeebcux We've been waiting for a final answer from the relevant department and the chargebacks team for the past 9 days and we're sorry for the delay. We'll get back to you as soon as we have any news. Kind regards
@eeeeebcux Thanks. We'll get back to you via DM as soon as we have an update from the relevant department. Kind regards
@eeeeebcux We've just replied your new DM

data.text: @eeeeebcux Hola, according to our colleagues, the vouchers have been suspended, because you disputed the original ticket payment with your bank. We're currently waiting for an update from the team responsible for handling the chargeback requests. Kind regards

@jnmssss Josicat, nosotros como aerolínea no establecemos los requisitos, estos dependen de las autoridades de cada país. Por lo que para confirmar la información te sugerimos que te pongas en contacto con las autoridades correspondientes.

urls.title: Restricciones para viajar por COVID-19
urls.description: Comprueba la normativa, requerimientos y restricciones para viajar que establecen los países. Planifica tu vuelo asegurándote que cumples con todos los requisitos para hacer tu viaje internacional.

data.text: @jnmssss Hola, te invitamos a revisar todos los requisitos y condiciones en el siguiente enlace https://t.co/J4NrDARBpq Además de la información proporcionada, te recomendamos verificar con las autoridades correspondientes. Saludos.
@HusamDemir5 Hola Husam, sorry for the inconvenience. Could you please send us a DM with your full name, email address and claim reference number https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@AmandaM90946822 Hola Amanda, sim, as buscas continuam. Respondemos suas DMs

urls.title: Croatia’s most beautiful natural parks | Iberia Plus
urls.description: Plitvice, Paklenica, Velebit, Mljet and Krka: in addition to its wonderful coastline, Croatia is home to some of the world’s most incredible parks

data.text: Did you know that Croatia is home to some legendary landscapes? From caves to waterfalls to beauty spots with stunning views... Explore them all in Iberia Plus Magazine: 👉 https://t.co/hJbHUWwkM1 https://t.co/JI3MjC6lgC

@markony05 with both on the ground and during the flight. If any irregularity is brought to the attention of the crew, our colleagues will be in the best position to correct the situation. Regards. 2/2

@markony05 Hola Mark, We are sorry to hear this. We can assure you that safety is our priority. We provide all passengers with information about the regulations and safety measures recommended by the authorities, as well as ensuring that they are complied 1/2
@julianasuprstar Hola Julianna, could you tell us the details of your flight and the booking code by DM? Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE

@KevinWi73275353 Hola Kevin, we apologize to read this, please give us the details of the incident by DM, we will investigate what happened and take the necessary actions. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB5NZjE
@TomikaM86169502 Hola Tomika, Send us a DM with as much info as possible, please remember to include your reference number and full contact details. Thank you. https://t.co/HyIAB652lE
@millspeed88 Hola Steve, could she send us  a DM with the details of her report and contact details from her profile please? We will gladly help her. Regards.
@de49175371 Hola Debbie, we are sorry to read this, we have replied your DM with the refund details, we'll continue through that channel. Regards
@jose_ribeir0 Hola Jose, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We have replied your DM. Regards
@lilpepperoniii Hola, we have sent you an answer again in our conversation by direct message. Regards.
@Michaelbwayp Hola Michael, we are deeply sorry to read this, could you please tell us by DM all details of your case? Thanks in advance https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI

@FletchTheTrader Hola Marc. We are sorry to read what you tell us. We hope that our colleagues have attended to your request in the best way. From this channel, we remain attentive in case of any queries. Regards.
@ArtySausage Hola, please send us a DM with more details of your case and your flight information so that we can verify more information from here. Regards. https://t.co/R34zzYiXKI
@kayjay_potato Hola, we have sent you an answer again in our conversation by DM. Kind regards.
